Class Sticker

java.lang.Object
io.github.natanimn.telebof.types.media_and_service.Sticker
public class Sticker extends Object
This class represents a sticker.
Since:
3 March 2025
Version:
0.7
Author:
Natanim

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    String
    custom_emoji_id
    For custom emoji stickers, unique identifier of the custom emoji
    String
    emoji
    Emoji associated with the sticker
    String
    file_id
    Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file
    Integer
    file_size
    File size in bytes
    String
    file_unique_id
    Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots.
    Integer
    height
    Sticker height
    Boolean
    is_animated
    True, if the sticker is animated
    Boolean
    is_video
    True, if the sticker is video sticker
    MaskPosition
    mask_position
    For mask stickers, the position where the mask should be placed
    Boolean
    needs_repainting
    True, if the sticker must be repainted to a text color in messages, the color of the Telegram Premium badge in emoji status, white color on chat photos, or another appropriate color in other places
    File
    premium_animation
    For premium regular stickers, premium animation for the sticker
    String
    setName
    Name of the sticker set to which the sticker belongs
    PhotoSize
    thumbnail
    Sticker thumbnail in the .WEBP or .JPG format
    StickerType
    type
    Type of the sticker.
    Integer
    width
    Sticker width

  • Field Details

    • file_id

      public String file_id
      Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file

    • file_unique_id

      public String file_unique_id
      Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.

    • type

      public StickerType type
      Type of the sticker. The type of the sticker is independent of its format, which is determined by the fields is_animated and is_video.

    • width

      public Integer width
      Sticker width

    • height

      public Integer height
      Sticker height

    • is_animated

      public Boolean is_animated
      True, if the sticker is animated

    • is_video

      public Boolean is_video
      True, if the sticker is video sticker

    • thumbnail

      public PhotoSize thumbnail
      Sticker thumbnail in the .WEBP or .JPG format

    • emoji

      public String emoji
      Emoji associated with the sticker

    • setName

      public String setName
      Name of the sticker set to which the sticker belongs

    • premium_animation

      public File premium_animation
      For premium regular stickers, premium animation for the sticker

    • mask_position

      public MaskPosition mask_position
      For mask stickers, the position where the mask should be placed

    • custom_emoji_id

      public String custom_emoji_id
      For custom emoji stickers, unique identifier of the custom emoji

    • needs_repainting

      public Boolean needs_repainting
      True, if the sticker must be repainted to a text color in messages, the color of the Telegram Premium badge in emoji status, white color on chat photos, or another appropriate color in other places

    • file_size

      public Integer file_size
      File size in bytes
